title: Problem with client. Please help!
body:
Hello!

So the problem is that whenever I start queue it wont show me that big Accept/Decline option. And this results to the photo from link. 
I talked to Riot support last year and they said that is from my internet connection(package loss). I pinged to EUNE server from cmd and I saw 0% package loss.The thing is that everything is working... literally everything (no lags,no spikes,no nothing. Browser also working perfectly)... but this Accept/Decline option never shows up. it's like delay of 10-15 secs that is enough time to finish queue and not accept. 
I am using ethernet connection. My router is really old (GR-534W) and my internet is the same like before. I've been using it for years and in that time League client was working perfectly!
I really don't know where problem come from. If someone can help would be nice! 
Thanks for your time reading this! Enjoy your day :)

replies.body: It does kind of sound like it's probably a connection based problem off the top of my head, but let's dig into this! If you don't mind, run a traceroute using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to the EUNE servers at 31.186.224.42, and post those results here so I can take a look. Be sure to block out the very top line, since that's a bit of personal info!

Hello Broporo!

Thanks for your assist about my problem. 
Here is the results from Winmtr application:
https://imgur.com/a/ns3Dr

Have a nice day!

Hmm this just show up after I let it to ping for some time.
https://imgur.com/a/Jdzto

And that server (ip-1-138.tcv.bg) must be the internet provider one because that is the name of the company (TCV)

So in summary I should talk to them and fix it somehow?
